title: Cold War Without the Apollo 11 Moon Landing

historical_divergence_point.description: The Apollo 11 launch suffers a catastrophic engine failure shortly after liftoff, grounding the entire Apollo program indefinitely. NASA loses political support and public trust. The United States never achieves the first Moon landing.

initial_consequences: Global perception shifts: USSR seen as the more competent space power.
Massive budget cuts hit NASA in 1970-1973.
Soviet prestige skyrockets, accelerating their Mars ambitions.
U.S. pivots from space to military and cyber R&D.
notes: This snapshot should be included before generating each day's new event.
